effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to freeze the target. During hail, this move has 100% accuracy. It also has a (100 - accuracy)% chance to break through the protection of protect and detect.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokémon. This may also leave the opposing Pokémon frozen.
